title: Switching from a Mac
excerpt: [digg=http://digg.com/apple/Switching_from_a_Mac]In technolgy news today it seems that all you hear about are high profile executives and long-time Windows programmers switching to Mac. You never seem to hear the stories about those who go from habitually using a Mac to Windows. The stories are just nowhere to be found. I, however, intend to change that with … more →
